ol.li: within a pharmacy in a position to enable a person in the dispensary to supervise the dispensary, storage areas for narcotic substances and poisons, the entrances to unpacking areas and areas for storing other substances, and the retail area; and
separate from any place where goods are unpacked or where general merchandise, not used in dispensing, is stored.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Each dispensary must be provided with—

ol.li: a sink and drainage board of impervious material moulded or manufactured in one piece; and
a reticulated supply of hot and cold water capable of providing to the sink adequate quantities of water for dispensing purposes; and
space for a dispensing bench with a working area not less than 1.4 m2.
